name: ULT
description:
ULT is a 2D horde-style action game with a focus on fast-paced combat and is intended for anyone looking for a challenge.

This is obviously a very early demo, more  a proof of concept than anything.  Any and all feedback is welcome, don't worry about offending me, this project won't work without your help. I believe if we combine my brain power with yours we could create something amazing.

The full version will have all the things fans of the horde genre expect: upgrades for weapons/abilities, in-level item drops and environmental assists, local/online co-op, etc. 

What the full version WON'T have is a nerfed base loadout. I want you to feel powerful from the start and just keep getting stronger. The movement should feel intuitive and the weapons punchy, I don't want you to start out moving at a crawl with underpowered weapons. There's also an enemy counter and FPS counter in the bottom right corner, that won't be in the final version.

Controls:

lmb = bolt shot

rmb = shotgun

L-shift = rocket

spacebar = dash

R key = pause

Gameplay tips:

-Your shots do not disappear when they hit enemies, they are based on a timer. This allows you to handle large crowds and hit enemies that are farther away.

-Melee enemies constantly seek out the player, ranged enemies move randomly.

-Melee enemies have 3 hp and ranged enemies have 10 hp.

Thanks for checking it out, please let me know what you think.

Music by Trevor Lentz: https://opengameart.org/users/trevor-lentz

Background images by Screaming Brain Studios: https://opengameart.org/content/noise-texture-pack
